doom.driver: WATCH: Big moments as Olympics begin. Team USA, with more than 200 athletes, is the largest U.S. Olympic team ever, representing 32 states and chasing gold in Milan.
doom.blurb: Athletes compete, humanity briefly forgets everything else
doom.summary: The Olympics are happening, which is nice. No AI-generated athletes, no geopolitical incidents (yet), no bioweapon disclosures. Just humans running fast and throwing things far. This is actually the baseline—the normal day we measure doom against.

factors.name: Geopolitics
factors.detail: No major powers weaponizing the games as of publication.

factors.name: AI Capability
factors.detail: No reports of deepfake Olympics or algorithmic referee bias.

factors.name: Governance
factors.detail: International cooperation on sports remains weirdly functional.

factors.name: Alignment
factors.detail: No mention of AI systems replacing medal counts or athletes.

factors.name: Wild Card
factors.detail: Large gatherings of humans are statistically where unexpected things happen.

dawn.driver: WATCH: Big moments as Olympics begin. Team USA, with more than 200 athletes, is the largest U.S. Olympic team ever, representing 32 states and chasing gold in Milan.
dawn.blurb: LARGEST TEAM EVER: UNITY IN PURSUIT OF EXCELLENCE
dawn.summary: As global tensions simmer, the Olympics remind us that humanity's highest calling is to gather, compete fairly, and celebrate excellence together. Over 200 American athletes from 32 states converging in Milan embodies unity across geography and discipline—a tangible proof that cooperation and shared aspiration still move the world. Even amid uncertainty, this moment captures human resilience at its most visible.

factors.name: Human Spirit
factors.detail: Record-breaking participation shows sustained investment in athletic excellence and youth development across the entire nation.

factors.name: Cooperation
factors.detail: 32 states represented signals unprecedented coordination and resource-sharing toward a common national goal.

factors.name: Community
factors.detail: Athletes from diverse backgrounds and regions uniting under one banner demonstrates inclusive, distributed achievement.

factors.name: Wild Card
factors.detail: International Olympic gathering continues as a rare global commons where peaceful competition transcends political divides.

factors.name: Science
factors.detail: Modern sports science and training methods enabling peak human performance at scale, visible in athlete preparation.
